column4: hi guys, I was at my local computer repair shop today because I had a lot of viri, but I noticed they were selling ubuntu, it was like half the price of a new XP, and the guy said that I wouldnt get any more viri if I switched over. so I picked up a copy, and now I dont know how to install it. I tried to put it on, but I think its broken. please halp me?
wanna buy OpenOffice.org for $100 its much cheaper then MS Office? :'D
